name: refnum
description: The primary key for this record

name: type
description: The type of maintenance, e.g., Migration, Reorg...

name: schemaName
description: The name of the schema for the resource.

name: action
description: The name of the maintenance resource to track.

name: startTimeTZ
description: Generated helper column to hold the time zone ID for 'startTime'.

name: startTime
description: The timestamp for when the refill started.

name: endTimeTZ
description: Generated helper column to hold the time zone ID for 'endTime'.

name: endTime
description: The timestamp for when the refill ended.

name: statement
description: The value of the maintenance resource to track.

name: descr
description: The name of the maintenance resource to track.

name: created
description: The timestamp for when the record was created. (TILDA.MaintenanceLog)

name: lastUpdated
description: The timestamp for when the record was last updated. (TILDA.MaintenanceLog)

name: deleted
description: The timestamp for when the record was deleted. (TILDA.MaintenanceLog)
